tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE automation_routines (
    routine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users_preferences(user_id),
    routine_name VARCHAR(50),
    routine_description TEXT,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences ( 
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    lighting_schedule VARCHAR(50), 
    lighting_settings VARCHAR(50), 
    automation_routines VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE LightingSchedules ( 
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    schedule_name VARCHAR(50), 
    start_time TIME, 
    end_time TIME 
)

CREATE TABLE LightingSettings ( 
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    setting_name VARCHAR(50), 
    brightness_level INT, 
    color_temperature INT 
)

CREATE TABLE AutomationRoutines ( 
    routine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    routine_name VARCHAR(50), 
    trigger_event VARCHAR(50), 
    action VARCHAR(50) 
)
